txt.en: 'I will meet you north, in Zirakazhâr. Bring the resin there, that we might melt it down.'
Pitching In
The cauldron is located in Zirakazhâr.\n\nYou should put the resin into the cauldron.

'Excellent! Now we shall melt it down. Fill that cauldron there. It shall take some time to melt, so you can take this bucket I just filled. Bring it to the walls and replenish the supplies there.\n\n'When you have finished, meet me once more in Amdân.'
Collect pine tree resin ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
The pitch-filled bucket can be found in Zirakazhâr.\n\nCollect the pitch-filled bucket.

'Our enemies have learned to fear boiling and burning pitch that tumble from our walls. Our pitch buckets have a sad lack of the black tar now, however. Go and gather resin from the pine trees.\n\n'I will meet you north, in Zirakazhâr. Bring the resin there, that we might melt it down. Let us make it rain black ichor once more.'
Talk to Dráttur in Amdân.
Talk to Dráttur in Zirakazhâr
Pitch cauldrons can be found along the walls of Zirakazhâr.\n\nYou should fill the pitch cauldrons.
DNT - Pick up a pitch-filled bucket
Collected pine tree resin ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Fill the pitch cauldrons ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Fill the cauldron with resin
Resin can be found on pine trees in the forests in western Azanulbizar.\n\nYou should gather pine tree resin.
Dráttur is located in Amdân.\n\nReturn to Dráttur.
Collect pine tree resin ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Dráttur is located in Zirakazhâr.\n\nBring the pine tree resin to Dráttur.
In the camps of the enemy, nervous soldiers tell hushed tales of burning, black ichor that pours from the walls of the dwarf encampments.
'Well done, friend. The enemy trembles when they approach our walls.'
Filled the pitch cauldrons ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'Melt down the resin, pick up the full bucket, and fill the cauldrons along the walls.'
'Well done, friend. The enemy trembles when they approach our walls.'
Talk to Dráttur in Zirakazhâr
'Melt down the resin, pick up the full bucket, and fill the cauldrons along the walls.'
Collected pine tree resin ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Talk to Dráttur
Pick up the resin-filled bucket
Collected pine tree resin ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Collect pine tree resin ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

'Excellent! Now we shall melt it down. Fill that cauldron there. It shall take some time to melt, so you can take this bucket I just filled. Bring it to the walls and replenish the supplies there. \n\n'When you have finished, meet me once more in Amdân.'
'I will meet you north, in Zirakazhâr. Bring the resin there, that we might melt it down.'
